channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says National Guard deploying to Memphis, Tennessee, next amid anti-crime push
item.description: President Donald Trump announced on Friday that he is sending the National Guard to Memphis, Tennessee.

item.title: Suspect In Custody Repeated Leftist Talking Points Calling Charlie Kirk ‘Fascist’
item.description: Authorities announced Friday they apprehended a suspect in the Charlie Kirk assassination. Authorities say 22-year-old Tyler Robinson was taken into c...

item.title: ‘Better put some chips down or you’re going to miss out’: U.S. tech is riding fears about rising global conflict
item.description: “There’s a ton of money being poured into defense from venture capitalists right now,” said Steve Simoni, founder of Allen Control Systems.

item.title: Charlie Kirk’s Assassination Should Herald The End Of The American Left
item.description: The left has always been a violent, revolutionary movement, incompatible with ordered liberty. Politics isn’t possible with the left.

item.title: The Week: Charlie Kirk and the Assassin’s Veto
item.description: Plus: Kamala blames Team Biden for her defeat.

item.title: Pentagon announces 'zero tolerance' for military personnel mocking Charlie Kirk's assassination

item.title: The AI drug breakthrough is taking a long time to arrive for reasons that may have little to do with the technology’s limits
item.description: “No matter how much data you have, human biology is still a mystery,” one analyst said.

item.title: Russia’s Poland Incursion Was No Drone Accident
item.description: It is vital that NATO responds to Moscow in a way that deters rather than encourages aggression.

item.title: We studied America’s entrepreneurs and found too many of them were burned out, anxious and depressed. We need a well-being revolution
item.description: The factors that fuel entrepreneurs' ambition can also create a sense of isolation.

item.title: Europe Is Going After America’s Biggest Companies. Trump Must Push Back
item.description: The administration should leverage an essential legal tool against unfair practices in digital markets.

item.title: Trump says he'll send National Guard to Memphis to combat crime
item.description: President Trump said Friday he'll send the National Guard to Memphis to combat crime in the city.

item.title: 'We got him': Suspect in Charlie Kirk assassination identified as Utah local Tyler Robinson
item.description: The suspect taken into custody for the assassination of rising conservative star Charlie Kirk is a 22-year-old local from Utah named Tyler Robinson, a...

item.title: Jamie Dimon says his successor at JPMorgan doesn’t need to be the smartest person in the room, they need to be the ‘Pied Piper’
item.description: Jamie Dimon says the next JPMorgan CEO must be a “coach” and motivator, not just the smartest in the room, as succession planning heats up.

item.title: Karine Jean-Pierre arrives for House Oversight grilling in Biden autopen probe
item.description: Former Biden White House press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre is the latest ex-official appearing before House Oversight Committee investigators.

item.title: Hyundai CEO says ICE raid on Georgia plant set back its grand opening by two or three months
item.description: CEO Jose Muñoz said the delay estimate is based on foreign workers coming back to help.

item.title: Trump says Supreme Court tariff case is about 'common sense'

item.title: Mother Quits CPA Job To Start Small School Supported By Texas Choice Dollars
item.description: ‘Schooling has changed even since I’ve been in school, and I really don’t want that for them.’

item.title: Trump slams NYC GOP mayoral candidate Curtis Sliwa as not ready for prime time
item.description: President Trump on Friday criticized New York City Republican mayoral nominee Curtis Sliwa as "not exactly prime time."

item.title: Charlie Kirk memorialized by dozens of House lawmakers condemning political violence
item.description: House Republicans sponsored a resolution condemning TPUSA co-founder Charlie Kirk's assassination at Utah Valley University and honoring his legacy.

item.title: The Siren Song of Despair
item.description: Kirk’s murder will long be remembered as a symbol of the irrationality and hatred of this era, but we also need to remember the importance of his life...

item.title: Deregulation: Clearing the Way to a Better Economy
item.description: We already have the tools we need to ease the regulatory burden.

item.title: After Charlie Kirk’s Murder, There Can Be No More Both-Sides-ism
item.description: We have met the enemy, and they are nothing like us.

item.title: There Can Be No Compromise With People Who Want You Dead
item.description: There is no consensus to be reached with people who actively wish for our deaths and then gloat when some crazed lunatic tries to fulfill that wish.
